content:
Southwest Airlines is a very passenger-friendly airline, and they offer online check-in and mobile boarding passes.

**Southwest Airlines Online Check-in and Mobile Boarding Pass:**

* **Online Check-in:** Yes, you can check in online for your Southwest Airlines flight. You can check in starting 24 hours before your scheduled departure time.
* **Mobile Boarding Pass:** Yes, Southwest Airlines offers mobile boarding passes. After checking in online, you can access your mobile boarding pass through the Southwest Airlines app (available for iOS and Android devices).
* **Check-in and Mobile Boarding Pass Timeline:**
	+ 24 hours before departure: Check-in opens online and via the Southwest app.
	+ 1 hour before departure: Mobile boarding passes are available for download.

Here are some benefits of using Southwest's online check-in and mobile boarding pass:

* Skip the airport lines: Check-in online and proceed to security or your gate.
* Save time: No need to print a paper boarding pass or wait in line to check in.
* Convenience: Access your boarding pass on your mobile device and show it to the gate agent or TSA agent.

Just make sure to have your mobile device fully charged and ready to show your boarding pass when you arrive at the airport.

Additionally, if you have any bags to check, you can print your bag tags at a self-service kiosk or have them printed by a Southwest Airlines representative at the airport.

Now that you've chosen your flight, I recommend checking in online and accessing your mobile boarding pass as soon as possible to ensure a smooth travel experience.
